long_description: What do you get when you cross a lightweight titanium spoon with a lightweight titanium fork? The ultimate eating utensil! Twice the weight savings--not only is titanium light, but you need only carry a single utensil cutting the weight you carry even further. Titanium leaves no metallic smell or taste and will not rust.
short_description: What do you get when you cross a lightweight titanium spoon with a lightweight titanium fork? The ultimate eating utensil!
